text:
Two persons murdered a youth from Madhya Pradesh.

Police said P. Muthumari of Padmanabhamangalam near Srivaikundam, worker in a cashew nut factory at Meenakshipatti asked his colleague Sundar Singh (25) from Bharasi in Panna district of Madhya Pradesh to clean a few machines when the latter was leaving the factory premises after completing his work. When Sundar Singh refused, Muthumari attacked him, injuring him.

Sundar Singh’s friend Dharam Singh, also from Madhya Pradesh, picked up an argument with Muthumari that triggered yet another scuffle between them.

Hence, all the three were terminated from service.

Muthumari, along with his unidentified friend, stabbed Sundar Singh and Dharam Singh when they were standing at Vaagaikulam bus stop on Saturday night.

While Sundar Singh died in hospital, Dharam Singh is reportedly battling for life. Pudukottai police have registered a case.
title: Youth from M.P. murdered
